questionText: Which Disney film was the last to be personally overseen by Walt Disney before his death?
Disney's California Adventure park was originally going to be called 'Disney's America'.
Which Disney attraction was the first to feature audio-animatronic figures?
The castle at Disney World is named after the castle in 'Sleeping Beauty', while the castle at Disneyland is named after the castle in 'Cinderella'.
Which Disney animated film had the longest production time, at over six years?
In Marvel Comics, which of these characters has NEVER wielded the Infinity Gauntlet?
In the comics, Wolverine's claws were initially believed to be part of his gloves rather than extensions of his body.
What is the real name of the Marvel villain Doctor Doom?
In the Marvel Comics, Spider-Man's web-shooters were mechanical devices he invented, not biological adaptations.
Which Marvel character holds the official title of 'Sorcerer Supreme' in the main comics continuity?
The planet Dagobah, where Yoda went into exile, was deliberately chosen because it was strong with the dark side of the Force, which helped mask Yoda's presence.
What is the significance of the dice hanging in the Millennium Falcon's cockpit?
options: They were used in the game Han won the ship with
They were a gift from Leia
correctAnswer: They were used in the game Han won the ship with

questionText: The name 'Padm√©' means 'lotus flower' in Sanskrit.
Which Star Wars film was the first to not feature the character R2-D2?
The word 'Ewok' is never spoken in any Star Wars film.
Which Pixar film took the longest to develop, at nearly 10 years?
Every Pixar film since 'A Bug's Life' has featured a scene during the end credits with 'outtakes' or additional scenes.
What was the first Pixar short film to win an Academy Award?
In 'Toy Story', the carpet pattern in Sid's house is identical to the carpet pattern in the Overlook Hotel from 'The Shining'.
Which Pixar film was the first to feature a human as the main protagonist?
The protagonist in 'The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask' is actually the same character as the Hero of Time from 'Ocarina of Time'.
What is the name of Link's boat in 'The Wind Waker'?
In the original 'The Legend of Zelda' game, the Triforce of Courage does not appear.
Which of these games is the direct sequel to 'The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time'?
In 'Skyward Sword', it is revealed that Zelda is a reincarnation of the goddess Hylia.
